price: 108. Usun tet addal umman waarak teetik aka ikkel koraanam mafaxaanaay magorrisan teetih Ion kacanuk gexxaamah.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يَبۡغُونَ عَنۡهَا حِوَلٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā lā yabghūna ʿanhā ḥiwalan
